explains: adj. 积极的，主动的；有……动机的
v. 成为……的动机；激励；<正式>（就所说的话）给出理由（motivate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: They are motivated by a need to achieve.
sentences.cn: 他们被成功的需要激励着。

sentences.en: The coach tried to get his charges motivated.
sentences.cn: 该教练设法激励他的队员们。

sentences.en: His actions were motivated by greed.
sentences.cn: 他的作为是贪婪之心所驱使的。
